synopsis.text: Bullton, Piper, and the young mermaid Neptina join Marine Boy, a talented teenage hero, on his thrilling underwater escapades as part of the Ocean Patrol. Equipped with his father Dr. Mariner's groundbreaking inventions, such as an underwater boomerang, a hydrojet, and a special suit, Marine Boy can communicate with sea life and breathe underwater. This expanded version of the original Marine Kid series features 65 new episodes, in addition to the 1966 series, all of which were sold to the US. Marine Boy's adventures unfold in the distant future, where he and his white dolphin companion, Splasher, strive to protect the world's oceans from evil forces. Dive into this action-packed animated series and witness the aquatic heroics of Marine Boy!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
